name: Poly Macro Oscillator 2
description: This algorithm is a polysynth where each voice is essentially a Plaits (the open source Plaits module by Émilie Gillet). It features multiple voices (1-8) with synthesis models inspired by the original Plaits, offering rich sound design capabilities through parameters like harmonics, timbre, morph, and modulation controls. The display shows notes being played by various voices, which theoretically decay forever.
use_cases: Polyphonic sound design with rich harmonic content
Complex modulation routing for evolving textures
gui_description: The display shows the notes being played by the various voices. Plaits voices never really end – in theory they decay forever.
